questions.quote: I was the last one on the end. George was next to me. And Mr. Bevilacqua, the gym . . .
All right, here, you call him right now. See if he's sniffing right now.
What kind of plastic do you think it is? What do you think like that dry cleaning plastic?
Okay listen to me. I talked to Gino, he's going to fix the haircut.
Oh, by the way, I checked at the soup kitchen - they do have cream soups.
That's no tragedy! How many people do you lose on a normal cruse? 30? 40?! Kramer, can I take a look at that book?
Uh,..we'll go to 3rd Avenue. So, can you come with us for lunch to the soup place?
No no, no, I want that table. I want that table! Oh, come on, did you see that? What was that? He took the money, he didn't give us a table.
No, it's like BO and cologne, they combine forces into some kind of strange mutant funk.
Lifts?! Look Kramer you don't understand, this kind of thing is just not done.
